text: @marklevinshow When is a real journalist at CNN or MSNBC going to interrogate Chris Cuomo’s doctor and ask him/her about the NY licensing authorities’ letter threatening doctors with loss of their license if they prescribe #Hydroxychloroquine for covid19 like my internist friend at CityMed got
